text: Would be really helpful if in the DM finder we could right-click an asset and have the option to "copy path"
<@U26BLKGE4> I realize itâ€™s not the exact same thing but you can use copy snippet and delete the HubL code and copy public url(for files)

Thanks for the tip Jon, I'll give that a shot. I just needed to share where a particular asset was in the DM, and being able to specify what folder and subfolder it's in, quickly, would be nice. Minor, but helpful lol

Hello! :slightly_smiling_face: I am trying to create an iOS shortcut for my sales-people out in the field to ease the speed of registration of a phone-call. Does anyone have an idea on how to easiest register a call?
